EmailTemplate.name: Web Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: Ffreedom Financial Planners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings Dear {!Lead.Name}
Thank you for getting in touch with us.
In response to your inquiry, we will be forwarding your request to the appropriate department.
We pride ourselves on providing fast and detailed responses to your inquiries. One of our department professionals will research your request and get back to you as soon as possible.
This message is an auto-response from our contact management system. We send it to let you know that your request has reached us.
Thank you on behalf of the staff at Ffreedom Financial Planners
Warm Regards, Team - Ffreedom
Ffreedom Financial Planners Email: contact@ffreedom.in Tel: 91 22 4222 4314 Fax: 91 22 4222 4314 Visit: www.ffreedom.in Corporate Office: 506/507, Morya Landmark-II, Near Infinity Mall, Link Road, Andheri (W), Mumbai 400 053
